description:
This update of Showers Pass Crosspoint glove keeps you in touch with your favourite touchscreen devices. “Chance of showers” shouldn’t equal chance or riding. Made from a waterproof breathable 3-layer material, the Crosspoint keep your hands nice and dry when riding on wet roads or in light rain. Windproof construction keeps the stinging cold out of your hands on blustery days. Strategically placed padding reduces fatigue on bumpy rides. And large reflective logos on the knuckle add a margin of safety in low-light conditions.

  • 3-layer Artex™ fabric is waterproof, breathable, and windproof. Note, as the seams are not sealed, these are not the right gloves for riding heavy rain
  • Strategically placed thumb padding
  • Microfibre patch on back of thumb for wiping glasses
  • Adjustable cuffs seal out the elements
  • Reflective logos on knuckles and cuffs
  • Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Crosspoint TS Windglove - Men's
